titles.title: A concurrent resolution to make a correction, relating to the maximum speed limit, in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 2.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.124 Reported to House.
Called up by House by Rule.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 217 - 206 (Record Vote No: 35).
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment without recommendation.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 60.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 60-21. Record Vote No: 35.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/16/1987--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 2 (authorizing funds for highways and mass transportation programs) relating to the national maximum speed limit.
